title: 'Holes are not aligned properly for the screws to fix'
body: 'Holes are not aligned properly for the screws to fix Not able to assemble'

title: 'Portable stand good one'
body: I bought it recently. It is a good one for daily use, but for keeping light things like, newspaper, snacks plate. My son uses for keeping dinner thali too. Size matches our sofa. Good for sick person for eating as it comes on the sofa. Colour is good. Use it & wipe it. As the stand touches hardly 2 inches area, it can't take much load.

title: 'Poor quality product'
body: First of all the holes provided to table top was mismatched with the groove provide and the groove nut was not properyfixed. The table top broke imidiatly as it could not support to take wt. Hopeless product don't buy it waste of money

title: 'Unique design'
body: 'This is a very nice sturdy table definitely add decor to your living room quality is top notch.THANK YOU AMAZON'
